Software.name: GROMACS
Software.overview: GROMACS is a versatile package for molecular dynamics simulations. It is designed for proteins, lipids, and nucleic acids.
Software.core_features: Molecular dynamics simulations, Protein-ligand docking, Free energy calculations, Trajectory analysis

Software.name: Tinker
Software.overview: Tinker is a software tool for molecular modeling and simulations. It is widely used for many biomolecular systems and materials.
Software.core_features: Force field calculations, Molecular dynamics simulations, Quantum chemistry calculations, Energy minimization

Software.name: AmberTools
Software.overview: AmberTools is a suite of programs for molecular dynamics simulations, energy minimization, and structure analysis. It is widely used in the field of computational chemistry.
Software.core_features: Molecular dynamics simulations, Energy minimization, Molecular mechanics calculations, Structure visualization

Software.name: Biopython
Software.overview: Biopython is a collection of tools for computational biology and bioinformatics. It provides functionalities for DNA and protein sequence analysis.
Software.core_features: Sequence alignment, Genetic sequence manipulation, Phylogenetic analysis, Protein structure analysis
